title: Bard Bugged?
body:
Everytime ive played Bard (its affected a few other players too) today, the game will hit anywhere from 13000 ping to 33000 ping the whole game. 
Yet any other champ, the games perfectly fine. 
Is it Bard being bugged or is my crappy iinet ISP screwing with me?

replies.body:
It's your ISP plotting against you, to make you not want to play Bard.

Nah, but I've not heard of this before. Are you 100% sure that it's you playing Bard that's causing this to happen? He *is* in a lot of games, so test it out in some custom games to see.
